content: crochet the most luxurious oversized winter hood pattern for yourself or your kids ***this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience *** **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 3 25mm d hook for hat body 6mm j hook for fur trim 520 675 yds #3 light weight paintbox yarns simply dk in champagne white or color of your choice 60 70 yds king cole luxury fur in polar scissors measuring tape **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet fpsc = front post single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet **special stitches ** puff yo pull up a loop 6 times in same st yo pull through 12 loops yo pull through final 2 loops fan 3 treble_crochet chain 2 3 treble_crochet in same stitch **gauge ** child rectangle should measure 10 wide before hood is assembled and fur trim is added teen/adult rectangle should measure 11 wide before hood is assembled and fur trim is added **measurements ** child 11 tall by 11 wide excluding ties teen/adult 13 tall by 13 wide excluding ties
